review: I could say lots of good things about the high clinical standards and welcoming, warm ambience of Wisdom Dental Clinic but here are some of the great things: Every single member of staff from the Dentists, to the Dental Assistants and  Front Desk Reception ladies actively listen to your needs and anxieties. Dr. Ashwini educated me prior to proceeding with the next steps. Highest recommendation for Dr. Ashwini who is extremely soft spoken and has a very calm demeanor. My surgical wisdom tooth extraction was a completely painless process, with high standards of transparency and calming nature of the doctor.  They ensure you have regular follow ups and explain the after process in detail. Highly recommended clinic for your dental needs.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
I visited Dr Ashwini in 23rd May evening‚Ä¶ I was in fear of cost and the agony of getting my treatment.., 
She was very patient, kind ‚Ä¶ explaining the treatment and justification of the expense. Her staff was also very polite and helpful. The positive vibes emanated from the lovely resort like interiors‚Ä¶ 
Xray and scans were taken immediately in her clinic itself and the estimate handed over to me by her front office secretary‚Ä¶. All in one appointment.
I must say, though there were many patients waiting to speak to her, she was kind and thorough with every one .. and that too , when she herself is recovering from an accident sustained last week.
May God bless you and wish you a speedy recovery.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
My daughter Dr Sanah is also an aesthetic  dentist in pune city  and she  has good relations with Dr Ashwini,  she  highly recommends Dr Ashwini to  all our  family members ,friends residing in mumbai for her excellent diagnosis nd expertise in oral surgery , various dental issues.
Dr Ashwini is soft-spoken and makes the patient  at ease  by explaining in detail the procedure  then going ahead with the treatment plan  and alwys available to answer queries.
Wishing her the very best 

Alwys will recommend Dr Ashwini to all .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Every person at the Wisdom Tooth Clinic from the team that manages bookings to the assistants to Doctor Aditi, Doctor Cinderella and especially Doctor Ashwini - are so very kind and patient. Not only do their ensure your comfort physically, they explain everything about your treatment to you, answer all your questions and make sure you have everything you need to feel okay. 
My extraction process was absolutely pain-free. The aftercare was explained to me very well and Doctor Ashwini was always available on call for any support. She is very knowledgeable and very very empathetic. 
The clinic is very hygeinic and well-maintained, state of the art equipment and I cannot say this enough - extremely kind, pleasant professionals.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,
review:
A very unprofessional & terrifying experience. 

In August 2021, I took my 85 year old mom (which is hard to do). The dentist didn't even look at mom's medical history file which we maintain. And decided to remove 2 of moms teeth in 1 appointment in 45 minutes. 

The dentist was rushed & not gentle during the procedure resulting in pain afterwards. No post operative care instructions were given either. I had to ask if antibiotics have to be given, diet or ice to be used.
My mom had terrible pain for 2 weeks afterwards. The dentist should have known better to not remove 2 teeth at the same time for an 85 year old.

And to top it all the dentist charged us 10,000 ( i.e 5000 Rs per tooth for a simple extraction).  Other dentists were charging 2000 per tooth for extraction around the same time.
The dentist has no right to do this to anyone.

review: I was told by a Dr in Marol that I needed an RC and three dental implants . I decided to take second opinion with Dr Ashwini who is an expert in this field . Dr took another dental X-ray to confirm  and one more  Dr specialised in RC double checked and advised me that it‚Äôs not required . Since I had lost two molars due to poorly done RC on the same side Dr advised me to go for Implant . I readily agreed and the procedure for a broken tooth extraction and an implant was done in one hour flat . I must say that, you will notice perfection in all the aspects . I strongly recommend this clinic to my friends and relatives in the future.

review: I had 2 teeth extractions done (1 of them was wisdom tooth). This was my most wonderful experience at a dental clinic (I've been to several dentists in the neighbourhood). *** ******* ** ****** *** **** *** a total life-saviour! Rest assured, your oral health will be in safe & trustworthy hands! About my experience - my extractions procedure waa smooth, painless and took barely approx 20mins. The printed guidelines given post-procedure are quite useful, and ensures no confusion. Also, excellent sanitization levels were maintained at the clinic - from checking oxygen levels to providing hairnets, feetnets and mask. A big thank you to the entire staff for being so sweet and wonderful, and keeping the environment so clean, calm and happy :-)
